attributes.action: Put in place that all dogs and cats to neutered and to reduce the neutering fees
attributes.background: Make all dogs and cats to be spayed and neutered to stop the wide scale of abandoned and homeless pets and unwanted litters and to stops shelters filling up. And to reduce the cost of pets spaying and neutering fees.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
